response.original_title: Recontar: Memórias do Recanto em Audiovisual
response.overview: (Re)Tell the story of Recanto das Emas from the perspective of students and community members, through the intertwining of history, memory, orality and audiovisual. With this objective, Recontar is an extension project that was carried out from 2018 to 2020. It is a pioneering initiative on the Recanto das Emas campus of the Federal Institute of Brasília, comprising one of the first projects of a newly opened campus.
response.title: Recontar: Memórias do Recanto em Audiovisual
